Blog.post: I jus woke up, and realized what day it is.. i jus hope to have a good day. It seems just like any ordinary day. Seemingly busy on the outside, im heading up to Monahans in Oakville tonite, if anyone reading this wants to join me. Ill be there around 6pm tonite. Well anyways Happy B'day 2 ME!

The weekend as usual began on a high note, and always for some reason, ends on a low one, or even a nonexistant one... wierd Friday Night - Tit 4 Tat -- great party, saw ppl i havent seen in years.. felt good... ' liquid courage was right there to help when i needed it the most. Lets keep moving shall we, Saturday... slow day, BUSY!!! night.. Dinner at Snug Harbor: very good, a definate 2 thumbs up... followed by a maad dash to burnlington, so that i dont miss the 70's party... What time did i get home... hmmm...... lets jus say LATE!!! Sunday -- tirreeed.... but still had work to do. Put up a patio umbrella, which ended up injuring me.... why is it that i feel so accident prone... ; nywayz, basically tired, injured i stayed home... Thatz it for now... Blog u L8r

Hey what do u knw, my very first posting.... Wht a weekend, cottage out in Minden, bar in Haliburton, back to the cottage, some video games, some swinging into the lil river, drinking..... cards... drinking...all in all fun exciting and i wanna do it again. :) Hopefully this weekend will be better, or atleast as much fun. For all that are reading this, party downtown tonite : Gypsy Co-op Charity Event: to help against Breast Cancer / or atleast to help find a cure, $7 cover, bring ur friends (preferably lots and lots of ladies... :) )

urlLink Let me educate those that are reading on my morning. I knw, it could have been worse, but in my position, it's abt as bad as a morning can start. I walk into work, and my PC refuses to log in to windows. this continues for abt 30 mins or so... then finally after kicking, screaming, and a smoke; it decides that i've suffered enuff, and logs on. One would think that this would have been the end of my problems, but .......... NOOOOOOOO!!!!! im still on hold with the idiotic people of Rogers wireless, just so that i can give them further business... but what do they do... THESE ASSHOLES keep me on hold, goin on 35 mins..... urlLink
urlLink THE MORNING FROM HELL!!!! urlLink

urlLink 10:45pm.... Tuesday nite, Neil and I decided to walk into a movie which we knew nothing about, save the fact that Denzel "theman" Washington was starring. 2 hours and 30 mins later... we walked out... completely stoked. MAAAAANNNNNN what a movie... For all those reading, it is a must see. It for all the conspiracy theorists this will boggle your mind.. On another note III AMMM SOOOO SLEEPY.. lol the late nite due to the movie was the cause of my sleep deprevation.. but all in all it was worth it.. Well thatz it for me... till next time Tune in.... Same Bat time... Same Bat channel... urlLink
